import React from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import { Input, Ripple, initMDB } from "mdb-ui-kit"; initMDB({ Input, Ripple }); function AddBooks() { const addbooks=(e,obj)=>{ e.preventDefault() axios.post("http://localhost:4000/api/book/add",obj) .then(()=>{ console.log("books added") }).catch((error)=>{ throw error }) } return (
) } export default AddBooks
